title: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area: Compendium of Regulations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Laws & Policies     Compendium of Regulations                Compendium of Park Regulations       Superintendentâ€™s Compendium The Compendium of Park Regulations, April 2016 for Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area is also available at park headquarters in Bushkill, PA. Contact the Rangers Office at (570) 828-2321.  Compendium Appendices A. Designated Roads and Parking Areas (Compendium Appendix A, 30KB pdf)  New Jersey roads New Jersey parking areas Pennsylvania roads Pennsylvania parking areas  B. Maps (Compendium Appendix B, 1.6 MB pdf)  Locations for public assemblies, demonstrations, and gatherings Alcoholic beverage closures Hunting restrictions in Pennsylvania  C. Justifications and Findings (Compendium Appendix C, 241K pdf)  Justifications and findings prior to 2006 have been archived and are located in Recreation Area Master File W54.
